# List of black Primetime Emmy Award winners and nominees

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Jump to: navigation, search

## Facts and
figures[[edit](/w/index.php?title=List_of_black_Primetime_Emmy_Award_winners_and_nominees&action=edit&section=1
"Edit section: Facts and figures")]

  * As of the 69th Primetime Emmys in 2017, at least one African-American has won in every acting category except Supporting Actor in a Drama Series.
  * Diahann Carroll became the first ever nominee (male or female) in 1963.
  * Bill Cosby became the first ever winner (male or female) in 1966.
